editorialNotes.standard: The mobile version of this stealthy adventure truly mirrors its console and PC counterparts. Nowhere is off limits as you scale buildings, leap from heights and dash through crowded streets, all while staying stealth on the hunt for your targets.
Here comes the wave! In this gorgeous open-world RPG, explore eroded landscapes, battle otherworldly creatures and unlock incredible skills.

ios.subtitle: An Epic Build and Battle RPG

editorialNotes.standard: If you’ve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. It’s delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in Pokémon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If you’re a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.
